sentences.en: “thought&I{[he]}  was getting a little uppity and needed to be slapped down” (&b{New York Times})
sentences.cn: “觉得&I{[他]} 正变得骄傲自大需要加以纠正” (&b{纽约时报})

sentences.en: A stinging slap across the face jolted her.
sentences.cn: 火辣辣的一巴掌打在脸上，她惊呆了。

sentences.en: Can you slap up a meal for my friends before we rush to the game?
sentences.cn: 在我们赶去参加比赛之前,你能为我的朋友们赶做一顿饭 吗 ?

sentences.en: He gave her a slap on the cheek.
sentences.cn: 他打了她一耳光.

sentences.en: He hit the water with a resounding slap.
sentences.cn: 他啪的一声拍了一下水.

sentences.en: He sent the horse forward with a slap on its rump.
sentences.cn: 他拍了一下马尾,马便向前跑去.

sentences.en: I gave the scoundrel a slap in the face.
sentences.cn: 我打了那坏蛋一耳光.

sentences.en: I'll just slap him around a little.
sentences.cn: 我要揍他几下.

sentences.en: If you touch me again I'll slap your face!
sentences.cn: 你若再碰我一下,我就打你耳光.

sentences.en: Julia gave Roy a slap on the cheek.
sentences.cn: 朱莉娅扇了罗伊一个耳光。

sentences.en: Occasionally they slap the water with their tails or churn it up in play.
sentences.cn: 他们偶尔用尾巴拍打水面，或者搅着水玩儿。

sentences.en: Of course, slap-bang in the middle of town the rents are high.
sentences.cn: 当然啦，市区正中心的租金是很高的。

sentences.en: Sarah slapped Aaron across the face.
sentences.cn: 萨拉在阿龙的脸上掴了一巴掌。

sentences.en: slap down divisive criticism.
sentences.cn: 压制造成分裂的评论

sentences.en: The stinging slap almost caught his face.
sentences.cn: 那狠狠的一巴掌差点搧在他脸上。

sentences.en: There was a resounding slap as Andrew struck him violently across the face.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁狠狠掴了他一巴掌，声音响亮干脆。

sentences.en: they deserve a hearty slap on the back for their efforts.
sentences.cn: 他们的努力值得衷心赞扬。

sentences.en: This path leads slap to the playground.
sentences.cn: 这条小路直接通到运动场.

sentences.en: We kicked off with a slap-up dinner.
sentences.cn: 我们先是享用了一顿考究的晚餐。

sentences.en: We usually had one slap-up meal a day.
sentences.cn: 我们通常一天吃一顿大餐。

words.tran_cn: 拍击；侮辱；掌击；掴…的耳光

phrases.tran_cn: 随便穿上；胡乱涂上；断然拒绝
名义上或象征性的惩罚

trans.tran_en: a quick hit with the flat part of your hand
to hit someone with the flat part of your hand

trans.tran_cn: 猛打，用力放置，尖刻批评、侮辱
trans.tran_en: to hit someone with the flat part of your hand
